statements: SELECT * FROM property_locations;
SELECT property_name, country FROM property_locations;
SELECT id, property_name, country, location_geography FROM property_locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM property_locations WHERE location_geography IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, market_trend FROM property_locations WHERE id > 100;
SELECT id, property_name, country, location_geography, market_trend FROM property_locations ORDER BY property_name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_locations WHERE country = 'USA' AND market_trend LIKE '%up%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT property_name, country FROM property_locations WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location_geography, 'POINT(40.7128 -74.0060)') < 500 ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT id, property_name, country FROM property_locations WHERE market_trend IN ('Stable', 'Decline') AND country != 'UK' ORDER BY market_trend ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, property_name, market_trend FROM property_locations WHERE country = 'Canada' AND id < 100 ORDER BY property_name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_locations;
SELECT property_name, country_code, lon FROM property_locations;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address FROM property_locations WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_value > 1000;
SELECT property_name, trend_date, trend_value FROM property_locations JOIN market_trends ON property_locations.property_id = market_trends.property_id;
SELECT * FROM property_locations;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM property_locations WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT property_name, lat, lon FROM property_locations ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_value > 100 ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT property_name, trend_date, trend_value FROM property_locations INNER JOIN market_trends ON property_locations.property_id = market_trends.property_id WHERE country_code = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM property_locations;
SELECT property_id, address, city, country FROM property_locations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT property_id, city, country, latitude, longitude FROM property_locations ORDER BY city DESC, latitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE market_value > 1000000;
SELECT trend_id, property_id, market_value, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT address, city, country FROM property_locations WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT property_id, address, latitude, longitude FROM property_locations WHERE country='USA' AND city='Los Angeles' ORDER BY property_id ASC;
SELECT market_value, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE market_demand > 100 AND market_supply < 50 ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT trend_id, market_demand, market_supply FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY market_demand ASC;
SELECT country_name, boundary_geography FROM country_boundaries WHERE country_name='Canada';
SELECT * FROM Country;
SELECT country_name FROM Country ORDER BY country_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_type FROM Property WHERE country_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE property_id = 3;
SELECT trend_date, trend_description FROM MarketTrend ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Country ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM Property WHERE property_type='House';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90;
SELECT trend_date, trend_description FROM MarketTrend WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT c.country_name, p.property_name, l.location_name, mt.trend_description FROM Country c JOIN Property p ON c.country_id = p.country_id JOIN Location l ON p.property_id = l.property_id JOIN MarketTrend mt ON p.property_id = mt.property_id ORDER BY p.property_name ASC, mt.trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_locations;
SELECT country, city, street_address FROM property_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM property_locations WHERE city = 'London' AND country = 'UK';
SELECT * FROM market_trends ORDER BY time_period DESC;
SELECT region, AVG(market_value) AS avg_market_value FROM market_trends GROUP BY region;
SELECT * FROM property_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT property_id, country, city, longitude FROM property_locations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM property_locations WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT city, street_address, latitude FROM property_locations WHERE longitude BETWEEN -90.5 AND 90.5 AND latitude BETWEEN -180 AND 0 ORDER BY city ASC, latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM country_info WHERE population > 1000000 AND currency = 'USD';
